snippet: A 15-year-old student at a Brownsville middle school was shot and killed by police officers on Wednesday after he displayed a gun in the school’s main hallway, the authorities said.
abstract: Jaime Gonzalez, a 15-year-old student at Cummings Middle School in Brownsville, Texas, is shot and killed by police officers after he displayed a gun in the school's main hallway; gun is later identified as a pellet gun.
lead_paragraph: A 15-year-old student at a Brownsville middle school was shot and killed by police officers on Wednesday after he displayed a gun in the school’s main hallway, the authorities said.

headline.main: Texas: Student With Pellet Gun Is Killed by Police
headline.print_headline: Texas: Student With Pellet Gun Is Killed By Police
